ygData.subject: AAAAAACCCCCCCCKKKKKKKK!!!!!!!!!!!
ygData.msgSnippet: I came across some disturbing info last night... Darkforge Armor is no longer NO DROP. All the pieces that I have that WERE NO DROP, arent any longer. This is
ygData.messageBody:
I came across some disturbing info last night...
Darkforge Armor is no longer NO DROP.
All the pieces that I have that WERE NO DROP, arent
any longer.
This is bad,bad,bad,bad....
Item farming was bad enough before.
Having the DF armor NO DROP saved us from having to
compete with other who want the items to sell or twink
their level 5 SKs with.
Now we are back to square one.
BTW...Why can ANYONE do these quests?
It is SK only armor.
And the same should go for all the other class armors
as well. These quests are supposed to be for a
specific class, yet anyone can do them?
Thats just stupid.

I for one am doing the FEEDBACK thing telling them of
my extreme displeasure at this.


Oh yeah..for some odd reason..the Hulking Gorillas in
the LTR now drop Decaying everytime
*shrug*..ya got me on that one

Bathory D'Allatu

=====
